column4: what is the ubuntu release cycle like? how and from where does it start, what happens in the middle (milestones etc), like that
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuDevelopment is a pretty good summary.  Releases are made every 6 months (april for *.04 and october for *.10)
at the beginning of that period, what do you have and where do you get it? are you completely going from the standpoint of ubuntu old releases?
they sync up with debian unstable.  #ubuntu-motu might get you better answers
